LitD_Music.SunnySideUp
                    /47 29
                    /TravisV 47 34 0 Haley 50 33 0 Emily 48 34 0 Leah 45 33 0 farmer 49 56 2 JeremyTSnail 52 39 1
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /ignoreCollisions TravisV
                        /ignoreCollisions farmer
                        /ignoreCollisions Leah
                        /ignoreCollisions Haley
                        /ignoreCollisions Emily
                        /ignoreCollisions JeremyTSnail
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Travis_Painting 16 32 47 33 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Haley_Painting 16 32 50 32 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Leah_Painting 16 32 45 32 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Emily_Painting 16 32 48 33 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor 7A.Seagull.3 32 32 26 27 0 false character
                        /speed JeremyTSnail 1
                        /advancedMove JeremyTSnail true 3 0 1 3500 -3 0 3 3000
                        /animate 7A.Seagull.3 false true 250 44 45 46 47
                        /animate Emily false true 250 16 17
                        /addConversationTopic LitD_CT_TravisPaintingParty {{Event Cooldown Length}}
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /skippable
                        
                        /viewport move 0 1 5000        
                        /pause 500
                        /faceDirection Leah 1
                        /emote Leah 56
                    /speak Leah "Alright, mine's done.#$b#I don't think I quite got the path right, but it is what it is.$h"
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                        /pause 50
                        /emote TravisV 212 true
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3 true
                        /pause 100
                        /faceDirection Haley 3
                        /pause 300
                    /speak TravisV "I for one think it's fantastic.#$b#It looks like the path to me, so I'd say it's a win.$l"
                        /emote Leah 20
                        /faceDirection TravisV 1 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote Emily 272 true
                        /showFrame Emily 48
                        /jump Emily
                        /pause 1200
                        /faceDirection Emily 2
                    /speak Emily "Yours also came out great Trav, it's soooo pretty.$h"
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Emily, he paints that EVERY single time.$u"
                        /faceDirection Emily 1 true
                        /emote Emily 8
                    /speak Emily "So? That doesn't make it any less pretty.#$b#Your cow portrait also came out amazing!$h"
                        /animate Emily false true 200 18 19
                        /pause 100
                    /textAboveHead Emily "We all did great!"
                        /pause 400
                        /jump Emily
                        /pause 300
                        /animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                        /pause 2000
                        /emote Leah 32 true
                        /pause 500
                        /emote Haley 40
                        /pause 200
                    /speak Haley "Girl, you just threw random paint splatters on the canvas.$s"
                        /pause 100 
                        /emote Leah 240 true
                        /pause 100
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                        /pause 100
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 32
                    /speak Leah "I think you just don't understand what she was going for.$7"
                        /pause 100
                        /showframe TravisV 28 true
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Agreed."
                        /pause 1800
                        /showFrame Haley 0
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 16
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 17
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Uhg. Well then can you explain what I'm not understanding?$s"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame TravisV 32
                        /pause 50
                        /faceDirection Emily 3 true
                        /pause 50
                        /showFrame Haley 12
                    /speak TravisV "Well clearly...$l"
                        /emote TravisV 244 true
                        /animate TravisV false true 250 38 39
                        /pause 400
                    /speak TravisV "Often in art, the color green represents the emotion envy.$6#$b#As the base canvas is green, the giant blue splotches represent the never ending desire for growth a mega corporation, such as Joja, craves.$a#$b#It will devour everything useful to it in its path, leaving nothing behind.$18#$b#The green could also symbolize the thoughtless destruction of nature through consumption, but that's another tangent all together.$6#$b#The orange splotches must represent the warm creative spirit, fighting back against the machine in small yet impactful ways!$12#$b#Yeah. That's definitely it!$13"
                        /pause 100
                        /animate Emily false true 200 48 49
                        /pause 200
                        /emote Leah 224 true
                        /pause 200
                        /textAboveHead Haley "*snickers*"
                        /pause 2300
                    /speak TravisV "Hey, what're y'all laughing at?$a"
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame Haley 0
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 16
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 17
                    /speak Haley "You're doing the thing.$13"
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                    /speak TravisV "The...?$6#$b#Oh!$u"
                        /showFrame Haley 12
                        /pause 50
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 36
                        /pause 1000
                        /emote TravisV 240 true
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection TravisV 0
                        /pause 1000
                        /emote Emily 28 true
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Haley 40 true
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Leah 8
                    /speak Emily "That wasn't it at all, but I appreciate the thoughtful interpretation.$h"
                        /showFrame TravisV 28
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Oh."
                        /pause 1500
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Are you serious? I had literally JUST understood it.$u"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3 true
                        /pause 30
                        /faceDirection Leah 2
                        /emote Leah 244
                    /speak Leah "I'm guessing it doesn't have a meaning, it's symbolic of the freedom of self expression."
                        /faceDirection TravisV 1 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote Emily 272 true
                        /showFrame Emily 48
                        /jump Emily
                        /pause 1200
                        /faceDirection Emily 2
                    /speak Emily "Eeeeexactly!$h"
                        /showFrame TravisV 33
                        /emote TravisV 240 true
                    /speak TravisV "Oh come ooooon. That's it?$a"
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "For once we're on the same page.$u"
                    /speak TravisV "THE FARMER THEN APPROACHES, THEN A VOTE OCCURS"

                    /end
